name: Cipher's Room (Tyler Holloway)
description:
------------------------------------------ Overview ------------------------------------------

Cipher's Room is a mystery puzzle game where you are trying to solve the mystery of what happened to grace hollows.

The game is free, but if you could donate it would help contribute to making the other 5 levels of the game as well as just improving the game.

There will be regular updates which will have descriptions in the devlog.

------------------------------------------ Backstory ------------------------------------------

Grace, known by her class and the deep web as “Cipher”, is a Computer Science major at Waterside University. She is the smartest student in her class and has won dozens of hacking competitions. She is a reserved shy girl, but manages to make anyone smile. 

For the past couple weeks she’s been acting strange, at least strange enough for her best friend Ethan to notice. He tried to persuade her into opening up, but she just told him she was just busy. Grace stopped showing up to class for a few days, and no one has been in contact with her.

Ethan decided he should go to her dorm to make sure she was okay, but the door was unlocked and no one was in the room Ethan called Laura, Grace’s mom, but she told Ethan Grace has been locked up in her dorm studying. Grace’s father, Frank, and brother, Max also had no idea where she could have gone. Its been 3 months now and Grace is officially a missing person. The police gave up searching weeks ago, so Grace’s friend, Ethan, decides to takea look. And so the mystery of Cipher beings.

------------------------------------------ Controls ------------------------------------------

Click on PC or Tablet to open menu

Escape to close menus

Tab to quit game

Leave and open game to change scenes
